article.title: Boeing Awarded $107 Million P-8A Contract Modification
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: The Boeing Company, Seattle, Washington, is being awarded a $107,100,000 contract modification to provide additional funding for long-lead materials in support of the manufacture and delivery of 11 P-8A Low Rate Initial Production III aircraft.Â The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
